data.name: Space Blast
data.detailed_description:
You are Zam, the king of Mars. One day, riots take place on the planet and it's up to you to travel the solar system and uncover a massive conspiracy perpetrated by a supernatural being named Fat Cat.

Space Blast is a twin stick shooter developed by Roligt Studios, and is their first foray into game development. Explore fantastical worlds filled with interesting inhabitants while enjoying simple but effective gameplay and a story featuring witty dialogue and an intriguing premise. Every world offers a brand new movement mechanic that spices up the gameplay and gives Space Blast its unique flavor.


Unique Movement Mechanics

Each level features a new mechanic that deepens the gameplay in brand new ways. From jetpacks to potions to rail grinding, Space Blast gets deeper and more interesting the more you play.


New Characters to Meet Along the Way

Of course, seeing as you're exploring the solar system, you're bound to meet some intriguing folks. Every world features a new boss that tests your skills with the new mechanic that's been introduced, each with their own memorable design and personality. Hopefully you'll be able to befriend some of these odd fellows.


Heartwarming and Funny Story

The main goal of Space Blast is to provide a short and sweet gameplay experience, but to provide a little more Space Blast also has a story that is surprisingly good. There are many characters, events, and places that will send you on a trip like no other. The humor and strife of this game's story will make you laugh so hard you'll never forget it.
